title: Does Riot Celebrate summoners B'days?
body: Im not asking for anything, nor would I like you guys to take this as a plea for something, my B'day is on feb 12, and I was wondering if riot would celebrate such things, if not I do understand I was just curious

replies.body: Yes they celebrate all ~50 million player's birthdays.
It would be cool if summoners got a birthday icon and an automatic message :3 ... and a 4 match ip boost.
Yea i mean, not a skin because that will be exploited, just a litle something that you can get for that one day of the year
Don't you get enough of that from your parents. I seriously hate birthdays. That's why I don't celebrate mine. But then again. I also don't celebrate Christmas and people find that weird as well.

I would be happy for a message to come up. thats all .


even if i faked my b day hehe

LIKE I DUNNO, ABOUT 80% OF PEOPLE
My B'day was on 12jan and i didn't get anything  -_- if u get anything then i will rage probably {{summoner:13}} XD
